package.name: orca

scratch.help: directory to use for temp files of package

auxbasisset.help: auxiliary to use, Delete if you do not want to use RI approximation

options.help: additional options that should be written to input file

package.options:
! DFT PBE NoFinalGrid
%scf TolE 1e-2 ConvCheckMode 1 Guess MORead MOInp "dimer.gbw" end %output Print [P_Mayer] 0 Print [P_Mulliken] 0 Print [P_Loewdin] 0 end

cleanup.help: files to delete identified by fileending
